Question
========
Which of the following studies describes a single-factor design?

Answerlist
----------
* A study of how gender and age are related to how verbal and spatial problems are solved.
* A study of the relationship between gender and education on how quickly someone can make a career in government.
* A study of whether gifted children are better or worse at solving emotional, cognitive and social problems than average intelligent children.
* None of the above is a single-factor design.
